snippet: The fire hydrant was painted black in "The Artist" while the makeup artist for "Albert Nobbs" studies the wrinkles of everyone he comes across. More on the tricks of the trade of nominees in the so-called craft categories at the Academy Awards.
abstract: The fire hydrant was painted black in "The Artist" while the makeup artist for "Albert Nobbs" studies the wrinkles of everyone he comes across. More on the tricks of the trade of nominees in the so-called craft categories at the Academy Awards.
lead_paragraph: The fire hydrant favored by Uggie in "The Artist" was painted black, the better to show up in the movie's black-and-white palette. The equipment in the soundstage scenes -- where Jean Dujardin and Berenice Bejo's characters get to know each other -- was painted gray and black, for the same reason.

headline.main: Black Fire Hydrants, O.C.D Costumes and Other Tricks of the Craft Categories
